response.job_title: Biologist | MSc Food Science & Technolgy | Environmental Education & Management
response.summary: Innovative professional, facilitator of continuous improvement processes and goal resolution, with comprehensive training in natural sciences, trained in producing and synthesizing information related to biological and community research with a projection towards improvement in education and environmental management. I have skills in field sampling, laboratory techniques, and management of Microsoft Office and statistical packages (RStudio). I also have knowledge of the science and technology of plant-based foods and the dairy industry. I am characterized by the skills for teamwork, strategic thinking, quality and safety of products, oriented to efficiency and pro-activity.
response.skills: Microbiologia, quality assurance, GMP, Teamwork, Continuous improvement, Food processing, Aseguramiento de la calidad, ISO 14001, Reacción en cadena de la polimerasa, Higiene de los alimentos, Microbiología, ISO 9001, BPM, HACCP, Mejora continua, Aptitudes de laboratorio, Trabajo en equipo, Sistemas de gestión ambiental, Educación ambiental, Alimentación y bebidas

profile_positions.description: Control and quality of the processing of plant-based foods, fresh and processed products, fermented dairy products, and substitutes. Physicochemical and microbiological evaluation of the finished product.
profile_positions.title: food and beverage quality supervisor

profile_positions.description: Tutor of subjects related to natural, chemical and environmental sciences aimed at students in the ICFES tests.
profile_positions.title: Educator in Natural and Environmental Sciences

profile_positions.description: Select and classify raw materials or finished products. Inspect the correct implementation and execution of the methods, protocols and processes developed in routine tests for product specifications in the laboratory. Classify samples according to their quality in accordance with established standards. Perform physicochemical analysis and microbiological quality of processed products.
profile_positions.title: Quality coordinator

profile_positions.description: Coordination of groups with a focus on scientific research, in environmental scenarios for the improvement of the ecosystem and its communities, focused on environmental education and risk management.
profile_positions.title: Environmental coordinator

profile_positions.description: Characterization of wild Angiosperms in Cundinamarca. Collection of plant samples in the field, pressing and alcoholizing of samples, drying and assembly.
profile_positions.title: Junior Research Assistant

profile_positions.description: Preparation of culture media, bacterial and fungal isolates, seeding of bacteria and fungi, measurement of microbial growth, preparation of soil samples, preparation of dilution series, and characterization of microorganisms by physical and biochemical culture.
profile_positions.title: Research Scientist in Microbiology

profile_positions.description:
Design and implementation of a joint project: Limnological study of various lotic and lentic systems surrounding the Yotoco reserve - Valle del Cauca, Colombia.

The inventory of periphytic communities, characterization of macroinvertebrates and planktonic communities, as well as the analysis of the composition of macrophytes and riparian vegetation in various aquatic systems were carried out.
profile_positions.title: Scientific researcher

profile_positions.description:
Together, he designed and carried out the project: Regional ecological analysis of the region of the Serranía de la Lindosa and surroundings. San Jose del Guaviare, Colombia.

Identification of the regional structuring and the Serranía La Lindosa. Identification of the continental vegetation, as well as the biotic and abiotic interaction of the communities in the Rio Ariari and the Rio Guaviare, identification of successional processes of climatic periods in the region, as well as the identification of macrophyte and phytoperiphyton communities of Caño Negro and communities phytoplankton and zooplankton of Laguna Negra
profile_positions.title: Regional Ecologist
